doc.title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
doc.author: Chen Lin
doc.excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Big Octopus by Chen Lin

main.head: Big Octopus
main.p: I started working on CG in 2005; in 2006 I entered Webzen China as a background designer. In my spare time, I like to paint scientific and fantastic objects, such as aircrafts and aliens. I also like to building models, because I think it could help me understand the structures before I paint them. I love painting and I will keep working on it.
